department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
建立生醫光電專業知識與基本研究能力
建構奈米與光電結合應用於生物醫學知識並提升實作能力
培養發展自主思考與跨領域創新能力
goal.en:
-Be able to understand the fundamental knowledge of Biomedical Photonics and be able to have basic research skills
-Be able to construct Bio-nanophotonics system and the ability to implement the basic components of the system
-Be able to development self-learning skills and inter-disciplinary learning skills

outline.ch:
1奈米生物光子學簡介
2金屬納米粒子的合成，表徵和光學性質
3金屬納米粒子的生物共軛及其在生物標記和生物成像中的應用
4使用金屬納米粒子的比色生物測定
5使用金屬納米粒子的基於式片和微陣列的生物傳感器
6納米粒子與光熱療法
7光動力療法
8實驗
9實驗
10學生報告
11考試（I）
12金屬奈米粒子的光致發光及其在傳感中的應用
13基於金屬奈米粒子的基於表面增強熒光，螢光猝滅和銀光共振能量轉移的生物檢測
14基於金屬納米粒子的表面增強拉曼散射
15實驗
16實驗
17學生報告
18期末考試
outline.en:
1Introduction of Nanobiophotonics
2Synthesis, characterization, and optical properties of noble metal nanoparticles
3Bioconjugation of noble metal nanoparticles and their applications to bio-labeling and bioimaging
4Colorimetric bioassays using noble metal nanoparticles
5Slide- and microarray-based biosensors using noble metal nanoparticles
6Nanoparticles and photothermal therapy
7The mechanism of photodynamic therapy
8Experiment
9Experiment
10Student report
11Exam (I)
12Photoluminescence of noble metal nanoparticles and their applications to sensing
13Biodetection based on surface-enhanced fluorescence, fluorescence quenching, and fluorescence resonance energy transfer using noble metal nanoparticles
14Surface-enhanced Raman scattering based on noble metal nanoparticles
15Experiment
16Experiment
17Student report
18Final exam
